description: This Course covers advanced photography processes to shoot long exposure night sky shots. In this course you will learn about the right tools, camera settings, equipment settings and processing of the raw images of the night sky. Students interested in photography and knows some basics of photography are recommended to take this course. The course material includes video lectures that are divided into five sections. these sections covers time lapse photography of milky way, post processing raw images, de-fishing the fish eye lens photographs and setting focus to the stars in the night before shooting. Recommended students should take as to learn essential of Astro-Photography and experience next generation of photography which is full of excitement and adventure.
title: Learn Advanced Astrophotography
